docs.abstract: Security, the bedrock of the social order, has become deeply inequitable, fraying Mexican society and politics.
docs.snippet: Security, the bedrock of the social order, has become deeply inequitable, fraying Mexican society and politics.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTERREY, Mexico — Viewed from above, greater Monterrey, with its corporate headquarters and golf resorts, appears as one city stretching between the mountains that surround it.

headline.main: ‘The Social Contract Is Broken’: Inequality Becomes Deadly in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Building Walls in a Violent Mexico as Inequality Rises

byline.original: By Max Fisher and Amanda Taub

docs.abstract: Speaking at Georgetown University’s law school, Attorney General Jeff Sessions backed unrestricted speech on campuses as he faced scores of protesters.
docs.snippet: Speaking at Georgetown University’s law school, Attorney General Jeff Sessions backed unrestricted speech on campuses as he faced scores of protesters.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Attorney General Jeff Sessions dived into the debate over free speech on college campuses on Tuesday, inserting the Justice Department into a little-known lawsuit against a Georgia college and, in a speech that embraced First Amendment protections, comparing the tactics of one student group to the Ku Klux Klan.

headline.main: Sessions Calls for ‘Recommitment’ to Free Speech on Campus, Diving Into Debate
headline.print_headline: Taking Aim at Protests, Sessions Joins War Over Campus Speech

docs.abstract: In “Black Detroit,” Herb Boyd celebrates the city’s rich history through its unsung heroes.
docs.snippet: In “Black Detroit,” Herb Boyd celebrates the city’s rich history through its unsung heroes.
docs.lead_paragraph: BLACK DETROITA People’s History of Self-DeterminationBy Herb BoydIllustrated. 416 pp. Amistad/HarperCollins Publishers. $27.99.

headline.main: In Praise of the Black Men and Women Who Built Detroit

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Black Detroit: A People's History of Self-Determination (Book)

docs.abstract: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced a statewide partnership to provide aid to the island territory days after viewing the damage wrought by Hurricane Maria.
docs.snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced a statewide partnership to provide aid to the island territory days after viewing the damage wrought by Hurricane Maria.
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced a statewide partnership on Sunday to provide aid to Puerto Rico in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria, as he called on the federal government to step up efforts to help its Caribbean territories.

headline.main: New York Expands Relief Efforts for Puerto Rico After Hurricane Maria
headline.print_headline: New York  Expands  Effort to Aid Puerto Rico

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Javits, Jacob K, Convention Center (Manhattan, NY)

docs.abstract: I returned to work after my psychotic break, but my bipolar disorder did, too.
docs.snippet: I returned to work after my psychotic break, but my bipolar disorder did, too.
docs.lead_paragraph: What do you wear the first day back to work after a 90-day leave of absence because of a psychotic break? This is the question I found myself asking a little more than a year after I joined the Legal Aid Society of New York. The last time my colleagues had seen me, I’d been wearing a handlebar mustache better suited to a Hell’s Angel than a 26-year-old public defender. I’d also taken to wearing a Mohawk — tried a case like that even. We won, thank God.

headline.main: The ‘Madman’ Is Back in the Building

docs.abstract: What do you think of how players, owners, teams and leagues have responded?
docs.snippet: What do you think of how players, owners, teams and leagues have responded?
docs.lead_paragraph: By now you may have heard about, or even seen for yourself, the various demonstrations of protest made by N.F.L. players on Sunday, as well as by a Major League baseball player on Saturday.

headline.main: What is Your Reaction to President Trump’s Tweets About Professional Sports Leagues and Athletes?

byline.original: By Shannon Doyne and Katherine Schulten

docs.abstract: Well-intended moderates have used unrealistic standards to judge anti-racism activism. But this is nothing new — just ask Martin Luther King Jr.
docs.snippet: Well-intended moderates have used unrealistic standards to judge anti-racism activism. But this is nothing new — just ask Martin Luther King Jr.
docs.lead_paragraph: Media outlets and commentators representing a range of political persuasions have called attention to recent outbreaks of violence in Berkeley, Calif., Boston and other locations where anti-racist and anti-fascist demonstrators have gathered. Intentionally or not, they have often promoted a false equivalency between groups that advocate white supremacy and those that seek to eliminate it.

headline.print_headline: Don’t Wait For a Perfect Protest

byline.original: By Michael Mcbride, Traci Blackmon, Frank Reid and Barbara Williams Skinner

docs.abstract: In advance of the Athens Democracy Forum, The Times solicited essays on some of the challenges facing nations today.
docs.snippet: In advance of the Athens Democracy Forum, The Times solicited essays on some of the challenges facing nations today.
docs.lead_paragraph: Looking across the globe, it might appear at times that violence, chaos and fear are getting the upper hand over order, democracy and reason.

docs.abstract: A car dealership in Denver faced an internet backlash after a retracted TV news report saying it had fired him. The facts were more complicated.
docs.snippet: A car dealership in Denver faced an internet backlash after a retracted TV news report saying it had fired him. The facts were more complicated.
docs.lead_paragraph: Von Miller, a star linebacker for the Denver Broncos, was one of many N.F.L. players who knelt on Sunday during the playing of the national anthem in what became a sweeping and stark show of solidarity against police brutality and a silent admonition of President Trump.

headline.main: Von Miller of the Broncos Took a Knee, Then a Sponsor Drew Scrutiny
